title: Leon Trotsky
summary: Lev Davidovich Bronstein[lower-alpha 2] (7 November [O.S. 26 October] 1879 – 21 August 1940), better known as Leon Trotsky[lower-alpha 3] (/ˈtrɒtski/),[1] was a Ukrainian-Russian Marxist revolutionary, political theorist and politician. Ideologically a communist, he developed a variant of Marxism which has become known as Trotskyism.
